column1: The Sack of Bar-en-Danwedh occurred when
column3: the outlaws of Túrin were massacred in Bar-en-Danwedh (House of Ransom) in Amon Rûdh by orcs.  Túrin was bound in nets and taken alive towards Angband.  Beleg was also bound
column4: but was left there to lie
column6: pp. 149-150  The only other survivor was Andvír
